name: M.O.C.O: Museum of Cryptids and Oddities
name_original: M.O.C.O: Museum of Cryptids and Oddities
description:
After my son discovered Super Mario Bros. he has wanted to make games. This is the game we made.

You play as Milo, an adventurous young boy who decides to start a museum and show off his collection of cryptids, now he just has to capture some.

The first test is the mysterious vampire only known as The Count. Using your homemade monster flashlight, and other weapons found along the way, travel the island searching for monsters become the ultimate collector of monsters!

More levels coming soon!
